title: Ukraine to Legalize Cryptocurrency by Early 2025, No Tax Exemptions Planned
body: Ukraine to Legalize Cryptocurrency by Early 2025, No Tax Exemptions Planned Ukraine is poised to legalize cryptocurrency by early 2025 , with the finalization of a comprehensive draft law underway. According to Danylo Hetmantsev , head of the Parliamentary Finance Committee , the legislation will regulate the cryptocurrency market, impose taxes on crypto profits akin to securities, and avoid tax exemptions to curb potential tax evasion. This ambitious move positions Ukraine as a progressive force in cryptocurrency regulation, balancing innovation and fiscal responsibility. Key Elements of the Draft Legislation Ukraine‚Äôs forthcoming crypto law is being developed in collaboration with the National Bank of Ukraine (NBU) and the International Monetary Fund (IMF) . 1. Legalization of Cryptocurrency Cryptocurrencies will gain legal recognition as a legitimate asset class. Businesses and individuals will be allowed to use and trade cryptocurrencies under a regulated framework. 2. Taxation Policies Crypto profits will be taxed similarly to securities. Tax exemptions will be excluded to prevent misuse and ensure fair taxation. A transparent tax structure will be implemented, simplifying compliance for traders and businesses. 3. Regulatory Oversight The National Bank of Ukraine and relevant government agencies will oversee crypto operations. Comprehensive measures will be introduced to prevent money laundering and financial crime. Ukraine‚Äôs Journey Toward Cryptocurrency Legalization Ukraine‚Äôs decision to legalize cryptocurrency reflects years of growing interest and activity in the crypto space. Crypto Activity in Ukraine Ukraine consistently ranks high in global crypto adoption indices , with a vibrant community of crypto users, developers, and miners. The country has become a hub for blockchain innovation, attracting startups and international investments. Previous Regulatory Efforts Ukraine passed preliminary laws in 2021 defining cryptocurrencies and providing a foundation for regulation. The current draft law builds on these efforts, addressing gaps and establishing a robust legal framework. Implications of Legalizing Cryptocurrency in Ukraine 1. Economic Growth Legalizing crypto could boost Ukraine‚Äôs economy by attracting foreign investments and fostering innovation. Blockchain startups and crypto exchanges may establish operations in Ukraine, creating jobs and driving economic activity. 2. Increased Government Revenue Taxing crypto profits ensures the government benefits financially from the growing crypto market. The exclusion of tax exemptions reduces the risk of evasion and increases revenue transparency. 3. Enhanced Investor Confidence A clear regulatory framework provides legal certainty, encouraging more investors to participate in Ukraine‚Äôs crypto market. International businesses may view Ukraine as a favorable destination for blockchain projects. Balancing Innovation and Regulation While Ukraine‚Äôs move is progressive, it aims to strike a delicate balance between fostering innovation and maintaining fiscal discipline. Opportunities Technological Advancement : Recognizing crypto legally can accelerate blockchain-based solutions across sectors such as finance, healthcare, and supply chain management. Market Expansion : Legalization could integrate Ukraine into the global crypto economy, enhancing its competitiveness. Challenges Tax Compliance : Ensuring that individuals and businesses adhere to the tax rules may require robust enforcement mechanisms. Regulatory Complexity : Balancing innovation with oversight demands meticulous policy design. Market Volatility : The inherent volatility of cryptocurrencies poses risks for retail investors. Comparison with Global Crypto Policies Ukraine‚Äôs approach mirrors trends in other nations: European Union The Markets in Crypto-Assets (MiCA) regulation provides a unified framework for member states, emphasizing investor protection and market stability. United States The U.S. is developing clearer rules, though debates around the classification of cryptocurrencies as securities persist. El Salvador The first country to adopt Bitcoin as legal tender, El Salvador contrasts with Ukraine by offering tax exemptions for crypto gains. What Lies Ahead for Ukraine‚Äôs Crypto Market? Adoption Acceleration Legalization is expected to increase crypto adoption among businesses and individuals, making Ukraine a key player in the digital economy. Partnership Opportunities Collaborations between Ukrainian businesses and global crypto firms could flourish under the new regulatory regime. Educational Initiatives Awareness campaigns and educational programs will be crucial to ensure smooth integration of cryptocurrency into everyday financial activities. Conclusion Ukraine‚Äôs plan to legalize cryptocurrency by 2025 represents a landmark moment for the country‚Äôs financial and technological landscape. By crafting a regulatory framework that promotes transparency, taxation, and innovation, Ukraine is setting the stage to become a major player in the global crypto market. While challenges remain, the proposed legislation‚Äôs comprehensive approach ensures a balanced integration of cryptocurrency into Ukraine‚Äôs economy. As the world watches, Ukraine‚Äôs efforts may serve as a model for countries navigating the complexities of crypto regulation. To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on latest news, where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.

title: Bitcoin Nears $2 Trillion Market Cap Amid Institutional Buying
body: Bitcoin Nears $2 Trillion Market Cap Amid Institutional Buying Bitcoin (BTC) is approaching a $2 trillion market cap , driven by institutional investors who are accelerating withdrawals from exchanges. According to data from Glassnode reported by CoinDesk , Bitcoin‚Äôs price is closing in on $100,000 , with exchange balances falling to a seven-year low of 2.8 million BTC . Institutional Activity Boosts Bitcoin‚Äôs Market Value Institutional investors have played a pivotal role in Bitcoin‚Äôs latest surge. Recent data highlights: Key Metrics 12,500 BTC Withdrawn on Dec. 11 : These transactions, worth $1.3 billion , accounted for significant outflows from exchanges, with half of them originating from Coinbase . 200,000 BTC Withdrawn Since the U.S. Election : This activity reflects sustained institutional interest in holding Bitcoin off-exchange. Impact on Exchange Balances Bitcoin exchange balances now sit at a seven-year low of 2.8 million BTC , underscoring reduced availability of the asset for trading. The $2 Trillion Milestone: What It Means A $2 trillion market cap represents a pivotal moment in Bitcoin‚Äôs evolution, signaling: 1. Institutional Validation With companies like BlackRock and Fidelity embracing Bitcoin through ETFs and direct holdings, institutional trust in the asset has grown significantly. Institutional buying is a driving force behind the consistent price surge and exchange outflows. 2. Competitive Hedge Against Gold Bitcoin continues to position itself as ‚Äúdigital gold,‚Äù challenging gold‚Äôs $17 trillion market cap. The outflows signify a shift in how investors allocate assets for value storage. 3. Broader Market Adoption Increased adoption by institutional players reinforces Bitcoin‚Äôs role as a mainstream financial instrument. Exchange Outflows: A Game Changer for Bitcoin Supply Decreasing Supply on Exchanges The sustained withdrawals highlight a growing trend of long-term holding , with investors moving their BTC to: Cold Storage Wallets : Enhancing security and signaling confidence in long-term price appreciation. Custodial Services : Institutions often use specialized services for safe storage of assets. Supply Squeeze Dynamics The reduction in available supply on exchanges could lead to price surges as demand outpaces availability. A smaller tradable supply amplifies market reactions to changes in buying pressure. Challenges to Sustaining the $2 Trillion Market Cap While Bitcoin‚Äôs trajectory remains bullish, maintaining its momentum faces potential hurdles: 1. Resistance at $100,000 Psychological resistance at this milestone could trigger profit-taking, leading to short-term corrections. 2. Regulatory Uncertainty Stricter crypto regulations in key markets, including the U.S. and Europe, may introduce additional challenges. 3. Volatility Concerns While institutional interest reduces speculative volatility, Bitcoin‚Äôs price swings remain a concern for risk-averse investors. What‚Äôs Driving Institutional Demand? Several factors contribute to the increasing interest from institutional investors: 1. Inflation Hedge Bitcoin‚Äôs fixed supply makes it an attractive hedge against inflation, particularly in the current macroeconomic climate. 2. Mainstream Financial Products Spot Bitcoin ETFs and custodial services have made it easier for institutions to enter the crypto market. 3. Decentralization and Security Bitcoin‚Äôs decentralized network offers a unique value proposition in an era of financial uncertainty. The Bigger Picture: Bitcoin‚Äôs Role in Global Finance Bitcoin‚Äôs journey toward a $2 trillion market cap is not just a milestone for the cryptocurrency itself but also a reflection of the broader transformation in global finance. 1. Decentralized Economy Bitcoin is at the forefront of a decentralized financial system, offering alternatives to traditional monetary policies. 2. Institutional Legitimacy The involvement of major players like BlackRock , Tesla , and Fidelity validates Bitcoin‚Äôs potential as a reserve asset. 3. Inspiration for Other Cryptocurrencies Bitcoin‚Äôs success paves the way for broader adoption of blockchain-based assets, from Ethereum to newer innovations in DeFi and Web3. Conclusion Bitcoin‚Äôs march toward a $2 trillion market cap underscores its growing acceptance as a mainstream financial asset. Institutional buying, reflected in significant outflows from exchanges and declining balances, highlights confidence in Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term value. As Bitcoin nears the $100,000 milestone , the market remains optimistic about its potential to disrupt traditional finance. However, investors should remain cautious, given potential regulatory and market resistance challenges. To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on latest news, where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.

title: Opportunity: Crypto still has less than 0.1% of the developers‚Äô population in 2024
body: The developer population is expected to reach 28.7 million by the end of 2024, according to a Statista report . Crypto and blockchain developers account for less than 0.1% of this forecast, but established devs are increasing exponentially. Electric Capital ‚Äôs just-published Developer Report shows this data , evidencing how early the crypto and blockchain industry still is. According to the report, 23,613 monthly active developers exist, of which 18,511 were focused on a single blockchain. Notably, the current population of crypto developers has grown by 3% in the last three years. Yet, it has dropped 7% year over year since 2023 and saw a 23% drop since 2022‚Äôs bear market start. This status could suggest the crypto and blockchain industry could still be in even earlier stages than some enthusiasts imagined. If this proves to be true, the current state of the industry represents a lifetime opportunity for pioneer developers innovating. Total monthly active developers in crypto and blockchain. Source: Electric Capital United States, India, Ethereum, and Solana dominate among crypto developers in 2024 Overall, 18.8% of all blockchain developers are in the United States, followed by India with 11.7%. The United Kingdom is the third most dominant country, with only 4.3%, evidencing the relevancy of the first two countries. At the same time, Ethereum ( ETH ) and Solana ( SOL ) dominate among the blockchains with more full-time and total crypto developers. Ethereum has 6,244 total devs, of which 2,181 work full-time, committing code at least 10 days per month. Meanwhile, Solana has 3,201 developers, out of which 582 work full-time. Interestingly, however, the higher growth among blockchain developers in 2024 was from what Electric Capital called ‚Äúestablished devs.‚Äù These are developers who have worked and contributed for more than two years with open-source crypto projects. According to the report, there were 11,243 established devs in the industry by November 2024, a 27% growth year over year and a 65% growth in the past two years. Of these 11,243, 668 are working with Ethereum and 141 with Solana. However, 1,151 (10%) are developing for the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) stack, which includes other composable blockchains. On the other hand, Solana was the blockchain that attracted the highest number of new developers in 2024. According to the Developer Report, 7,625 new developers explored Solana at one point this year. Solana was the #1 ecosystem for new devs in 2024. Source: Electric Capital Development opportunity in crypto and blockchain As things develop, crypto‚Äôs ability to cross the chasm, reaching a broader audience, could bring more developers to the industry. Nevertheless, the significantly small share of the world‚Äôs developer population building for blockchain-related projects highlights the growth opportunity for the market in the following years. Some analysts expect 2025 to be ‚Äú the mother of all bull markets ‚Äù and ‚Äú the biggest crypto bull run ever .‚Äù Alex Becker and other experts have pointed out ‚Äúutility altcoins‚Äù as the potential ‚Äú easiest and surest ‚Äù play in crypto. If these predictions become true, we could see a massive inflow of developers into the ecosystem, building utility projects and capitalizing from this lifetime opportunity. Featured image from Shutterstock. The post Opportunity: Crypto still has less than 0.1% of the developers‚Äô population in 2024 appeared first on Finbold .

title: Bitcoin Exchange Balances Hit Seven-Year Low at 2.8M, Signaling Institutional Demand
body: Bitcoin Exchange Balances Hit Seven-Year Low at 2.8M, Signaling Institutional Demand Bitcoin exchange balances have plummeted to their lowest levels in seven years, with just 2.8 million BTC remaining on trading platforms, according to data from Glassnode cited by CoinDesk . The sharp decline is attributed to institutional buying , as significant outflows have occurred since the U.S. election. Institutional Buying Behind Exchange Outflows Recent Trends Outflows of Over $10 Million : High-value Bitcoin transactions are leaving exchanges at an unprecedented pace, suggesting accumulation by institutions. 200,000 BTC Withdrawn : Nearly 200,000 BTC have exited exchanges recently, with December 11 alone seeing 12,500 BTC withdrawn. Major Platforms Affected Coinbase Leads Withdrawals : Nearly half of the BTC withdrawn on Dec. 11 came from Coinbase, a favored platform among institutional investors. Why Exchange Balances Are Declining 1. Long-Term Storage The outflows indicate that investors are moving Bitcoin to cold storage or self-custodial wallets, reflecting long-term holding strategies. 2. Institutional Demand The rise of spot Bitcoin ETFs and corporate adoption has fueled demand among institutions. BlackRock‚Äôs Spot ETF : Contributing to increased institutional interest and direct custody over assets. 3. Reduced Selling Pressure Lower exchange balances mean reduced availability of Bitcoin for trading, potentially reducing selling pressure and supporting higher prices. Market Implications of Reduced Exchange Balances 1. Supply Squeeze As Bitcoin exits exchanges, its circulating supply on trading platforms diminishes, potentially driving prices higher as demand outpaces supply. 2. Increased Price Volatility With fewer coins available for trading, price swings may become more pronounced, especially during periods of high demand. 3. Confidence in Long-Term Value The shift to long-term storage signals growing confidence in Bitcoin‚Äôs role as a store of value, akin to digital gold. Challenges Amid Declining Exchange Balances While the reduction in exchange balances signals strong investor sentiment, it also comes with challenges: Sustainability of $2 Trillion Market Cap : Bitcoin has struggled to maintain a $2 trillion market cap despite institutional support. Psychological Resistance at $100,000 : The asset faces significant resistance at the $100,000 price level, with recent pullbacks dampening bullish momentum. Institutional Investors Driving the Shift ETFs and Corporate Adoption The approval of spot Bitcoin ETFs and corporate treasuries adopting BTC are key drivers: BlackRock, Fidelity, and Others : Major firms are buying Bitcoin directly, reducing reliance on exchanges. Tesla‚Äôs Holdings : Corporate examples like Tesla underline the trend of holding Bitcoin as a treasury asset. Macro-Economic Drivers Inflation Hedge : Bitcoin‚Äôs limited supply makes it an attractive hedge against inflation. Decentralization Appeal : Institutions value Bitcoin‚Äôs decentralized nature in uncertain economic times. What This Means for Retail Investors For retail investors, declining exchange balances suggest: Limited Opportunities to Buy : Reduced supply may make it harder to acquire Bitcoin at current levels. Potential for Price Surges : Supply constraints could lead to higher prices, benefiting early adopters. Need for Strategic Holding : Investors should consider long-term storage solutions to secure their holdings. Conclusion The decline in Bitcoin exchange balances to a seven-year low of 2.8 million BTC underscores the growing influence of institutional demand on the cryptocurrency market. While this trend signals confidence in Bitcoin‚Äôs future, it also highlights challenges in sustaining key market milestones like the $2 trillion market cap and $100,000 price level . As Bitcoin continues to evolve as a store of value and a hedge against economic uncertainty, its diminishing supply on exchanges may lead to increased volatility and opportunities for both retail and institutional investors. title: CryptoQuant: Bitcoin Bull Market Intact, Peak Yet to Come
body: CryptoQuant: Bitcoin Bull Market Intact, Peak Yet to Come The Bitcoin bull market is far from over, according to CryptoQuant contributor Datascope. In a recent analysis, Datascope affirmed that Bitcoin‚Äôs price trajectory remains positive, with no signs of the market reaching its peak. However, critical indicators suggest caution as prices approach potential correction zones. Key Insights from CryptoQuant‚Äôs Analysis Datascope‚Äôs insights hinge on the interplay between Bitcoin‚Äôs 30-day bull-bear market cycle moving average and its 365-day moving average : 1. Bull Market Confirmation Bitcoin continues to exhibit bullish momentum as long as the 30-day moving average (short-term) stays above the 365-day moving average (long-term) . The gap between these averages serves as a key signal for the market‚Äôs direction. 2. Stronger Bullish Signal Pending A more definitive bullish signal would emerge if the 30-day average crosses above the 365-day average , further solidifying the uptrend. 3. Potential Correction Zones While the long-term outlook remains positive, short-term corrections are possible. Investors are advised to stay cautious as prices test resistance levels. The Current State of Bitcoin‚Äôs Bull Market Positive Momentum Bitcoin‚Äôs sustained price growth underscores the strength of its current bull run. Market trends, coupled with institutional adoption and macroeconomic factors, continue to support the asset‚Äôs upward trajectory. Unreached Peak CryptoQuant‚Äôs analysis indicates that Bitcoin has not yet reached its peak, suggesting room for further growth before a significant market reversal. Bull-Bear Cycle Dynamics The relationship between short- and long-term moving averages is critical for understanding Bitcoin‚Äôs market phases. A consistent gap in favor of the 30-day average reflects sustained bullish momentum. Investor Considerations in the Current Market 1. Short-Term Volatility Investors should be prepared for price fluctuations as Bitcoin approaches resistance levels. Corrections are a natural part of bull markets and can provide buying opportunities. 2. Long-Term Outlook The long-term moving average indicates robust market health, reinforcing Bitcoin‚Äôs position as a store of value and investment asset. 3. Risk Management Set stop-loss orders to mitigate potential losses. Diversify portfolios to balance exposure to Bitcoin and other assets. Factors Supporting Bitcoin‚Äôs Bull Market 1. Institutional Adoption BlackRock‚Äôs Bitcoin ETF recently surpassed its gold counterpart in AUM, signaling growing institutional interest. Major corporations continue to incorporate Bitcoin into their treasury strategies. 2. Macro-Economic Environment Inflation concerns and a weakening dollar drive demand for Bitcoin as a hedge. Central banks‚Äô exploration of digital currencies boosts the credibility of blockchain-based assets. 3. Technological Advancements Enhancements in Bitcoin infrastructure, such as Lightning Network adoption, improve scalability and usability. Potential Risks to the Bull Market 1. Regulatory Uncertainty Stricter crypto regulations in key markets could impact institutional and retail participation. 2. Market Saturation Over-leveraged positions among traders could exacerbate corrections. 3. External Shocks Macro-economic events, such as geopolitical instability or unexpected monetary policy changes, could trigger short-term volatility. Conclusion CryptoQuant‚Äôs analysis confirms that Bitcoin‚Äôs bull market remains intact, with its peak still on the horizon. The interplay between short- and long-term moving averages highlights sustained positive momentum, though investors should remain cautious as the market approaches potential correction zones. As the crypto ecosystem evolves and adoption grows, Bitcoin continues to cement its status as a leading asset in the financial landscape. For investors, understanding the nuances of bull-bear cycles and market signals can provide a significant edge in navigating this dynamic environment. title: Australia‚Äôs AMP Allocates $27M in Bitcoin for Retirement Fund
body: Australia‚Äôs AMP Allocates $27M in Bitcoin for Retirement Fund In a groundbreaking move, Australian financial giant AMP has invested $27 million in Bitcoin (BTC) through its retirement fund. The firm, which manages assets worth $56 billion , is among the first in Australia to include Bitcoin in its portfolio for retirement savings. This development, reported by Financial Review , highlights a growing trend of institutional adoption of cryptocurrencies despite skepticism from other major Australian funds. AMP‚Äôs Bold Move into Bitcoin AMP‚Äôs decision to allocate part of its retirement fund to Bitcoin reflects a strategic shift toward diversifying its investment portfolio. Amount Invested : $27 million Purpose : Diversification and potential long-term growth Context : AMP‚Äôs move is part of a broader global trend where financial institutions increasingly view Bitcoin as a viable asset class. This investment signifies confidence in Bitcoin‚Äôs ability to act as a hedge against inflation and an opportunity for high returns in the evolving financial landscape. Australia‚Äôs Cautious Crypto Landscape While AMP‚Äôs foray into Bitcoin is noteworthy, it contrasts sharply with the stance of other major Australian funds, many of which remain reluctant to invest in cryptocurrencies. Why Are Other Funds Hesitant? Volatility Concerns : Bitcoin‚Äôs price fluctuations make it a risky asset for retirement funds, which typically prioritize stability. Regulatory Uncertainty : Lack of clear cryptocurrency regulations in Australia adds an element of risk for institutional investors. Conservative Investment Strategies : Many funds adhere to traditional investment models, avoiding emerging asset classes like crypto. The Case for Bitcoin in Retirement Funds AMP‚Äôs investment aligns with a growing recognition of Bitcoin‚Äôs potential as a strategic asset. Key Benefits of Bitcoin Investment Inflation Hedge : Bitcoin‚Äôs fixed supply of 21 million coins makes it a hedge against inflation, much like gold. Diversification : Adding Bitcoin to a retirement portfolio can reduce risk by diversifying across asset classes. High Growth Potential : Bitcoin has historically delivered outsized returns compared to traditional assets. AMP‚Äôs Long-Term Vision By investing in Bitcoin, AMP demonstrates a forward-thinking approach to retirement fund management. The firm acknowledges Bitcoin‚Äôs volatility but emphasizes its long-term growth potential. Bitcoin and the Global Pension Industry AMP‚Äôs investment echoes similar moves in the global financial sector: United States : Fidelity Investments offers Bitcoin exposure for retirement accounts through its Digital Assets platform. Europe : Pension funds in Switzerland and the Netherlands have begun exploring crypto investments. These developments highlight a gradual shift in how institutional investors perceive cryptocurrencies as part of a diversified portfolio. Challenges and Risks Despite its potential, investing in Bitcoin through retirement funds carries challenges: Market Volatility : Bitcoin‚Äôs price swings could lead to significant short-term losses. Regulatory Hurdles : Ongoing changes in crypto regulations may affect institutional adoption. Liquidity Concerns : Converting Bitcoin to cash can be more complex than traditional assets. AMP‚Äôs move also raises questions about the fiduciary responsibilities of retirement fund managers, especially in a market as unpredictable as cryptocurrency. How Does AMP‚Äôs Investment Compare Globally? AMP‚Äôs $27M Bitcoin allocation is part of a broader trend of institutional adoption. Global Context : While AMP is a pioneer in Australia, firms like Tesla, MicroStrategy, and Square have already integrated Bitcoin into their financial strategies. Emerging Trend : Pension funds globally are starting to view Bitcoin as an alternative investment, driven by its resilience and growing acceptance. Conclusion AMP‚Äôs decision to invest $27 million in Bitcoin for its retirement fund is a bold step that sets it apart from other major Australian funds. While the move reflects confidence in Bitcoin‚Äôs potential, it also underscores the challenges of navigating a volatile and emerging asset class. As institutional interest in cryptocurrency grows globally, AMP‚Äôs investment may encourage other Australian funds to reconsider their stance. For now, AMP‚Äôs pioneering approach positions it as a forward-thinking leader in Australia‚Äôs financial landscape. title: GRIFFAIN founder‚Äôs meme coin BLINK surges above 200% in 24 hour trading
body: Blinkdot, one of the Solana meme coins launched by the founder of AI agents platform GRIFFAIN, soared by 205% in the span of 24 hours. BLINK‚Äôs market cap has reached nearly $50 million. According to data from meme coin tracking platform GMGN.Ai , the Blinkdot token or BLINK soared as high as 205% in 24 hours of trading. The Solana ( SOL )-based meme coin created by GRIFFAIN founder Elvin Ng is currently trading hands at $0.44. BLINK‚Äôs market cap briefly flirted with the $50 million threshold, reaching $49.2 million. Meanwhile, its liquidity has stayed consistent at $1.4 million. Price chart on GMGN.Ai for the Blinkdot token, December 13, 2024 | Source: GMGN.Ai You might also like: Holdstation launches A(i)gentFi, the first AI agent hub on ZKsync BLINK has a 24 hour trading volume and a fully diluted volume of $42.7 million. According to the market data on GMGN.Ai, there around 6,000 BLINK holders, with 21.1% of the token supply held by the top 10 holders in the community. Launched in June 2024, the Blinkdot meme coin was created with the purpose of providing with a new interactive way to communicate online using the coin‚Äôs unique ‚Äúwink‚Äù feature. As the token features one lone eye with a green pupil, it is said to blink on X if the trader sets ‚ÄúAllow Solana actions on X‚Äù in their settings. Blink is one of the meme coins founded on GRIFFAIN , a platform that allows users to set up personal AI agents to manage digital assts. Though, it is currently limited to traders with early access or holders of Griffain‚Äôs Saga Genesis tokens. These tokens include Blink, Send and Griffain, which are already making waves in the crypto market. The Griffain token‚Äôs market cap hit a peak at $320 million, while Send‚Äôs market cap once reached $25.6 million. The platform provides creators with tools that do not require coding, making it easier to create content and develop applications. Not only that, GRIFFAIN also acts as a platform that facilitates users in trading and using Blink tokens. AI agents on GRIFFAIN are tasked with managing assets on digital wallets. Users can also manage their own tokens and NFTs as well as check wallet balances by communicating with the AI agents. Additionally, AI agents on the platform can also create NFTs by generating images and storing them permanently on chain. title: Australia Proposes Stricter Crypto Oversight to Combat Financial Crime
body: Australia Proposes Stricter Crypto Oversight to Combat Financial Crime As cryptocurrencies gain global traction, Australia has taken a bold step toward regulating the digital asset ecosystem. The Australian Transaction Reports and Analysis Centre (AUSTRAC) recently unveiled draft rules aimed at strengthening anti-money laundering (AML) and counter-terrorism financing (CTF) measures for high-risk sectors, including cryptocurrency. This initiative comes at a pivotal time, with the crypto market booming and concerns about illicit activities on the rise. The draft rules focus on stricter customer verification, enhanced transaction reporting, and adherence to international compliance standards like the travel rule . Public consultation on these proposals is open until February 14, 2025 , allowing industry stakeholders to weigh in on the future of crypto regulation in Australia. Why Stricter Crypto Regulations Are Necessary Cryptocurrencies have revolutionized the financial landscape, offering faster, cheaper, and borderless transactions. However, their decentralized and pseudonymous nature also makes them attractive to bad actors. In recent years, the use of digital currencies for money laundering, fraud, and terrorism financing has raised alarms globally. In Australia, AUSTRAC‚Äôs proposed regulations aim to: Mitigate Financial Crime : Strengthen safeguards against money laundering and terrorism financing through the crypto sector. Protect Market Integrity : Build trust in Australia‚Äôs rapidly expanding digital asset market. Align with Global Standards : Ensure compliance with international frameworks such as the Financial Action Task Force (FATF) recommendations. Key Provisions of the Proposed Rules The draft rules outline specific measures to enhance oversight and accountability in the cryptocurrency sector. Here are the key highlights: 1. Stricter Customer Verification Requirements Businesses must implement robust know-your-customer (KYC) processes to verify the identities of individuals and entities transacting in digital currencies. Enhanced measures may include cross-referencing government-issued IDs, biometric checks, and proof of address. 2. Comprehensive Reporting Obligations Cryptocurrency exchanges and service providers will need to file detailed transaction reports with AUSTRAC. Suspicious transaction reporting will become mandatory, helping authorities identify and act against potential threats. 3. Compliance with the Travel Rule The travel rule requires cryptocurrency businesses to share customer information when transferring funds across platforms. This ensures that key details, such as the sender‚Äôs and receiver‚Äôs information, are recorded and accessible. The Global Context of Crypto Regulation Australia‚Äôs move aligns with a growing international trend toward stricter crypto oversight. United States The U.S. has introduced several legislative measures to monitor crypto transactions, focusing on AML and CTF compliance. European Union The EU has adopted the Markets in Crypto-Assets Regulation (MiCA) , setting a clear framework for digital assets while prioritizing consumer protection and market stability. FATF Standards The FATF has provided detailed guidelines on crypto compliance, urging nations to implement robust mechanisms to prevent illicit activities. Australia‚Äôs proposed regulations are in line with these international efforts, reflecting the country‚Äôs proactive stance on digital asset governance. Australia‚Äôs Growing Cryptocurrency Market Australia has emerged as a significant player in the global cryptocurrency market, with increasing adoption among individuals and institutions. Factors driving this growth include: 1. High Adoption Rates A 2024 survey revealed that nearly 20% of Australians own cryptocurrencies, with Bitcoin and Ethereum being the most popular choices. 2. Thriving Crypto Startups Cities like Sydney and Melbourne have become hubs for blockchain innovation, hosting startups focused on DeFi, NFT marketplaces, and tokenized assets. 3. Institutional Interest Major financial institutions in Australia are exploring crypto-related services, such as custody solutions and crypto-backed loans. With such rapid growth, the need for a robust regulatory framework has become more pressing than ever. Benefits of Stricter Oversight The proposed regulations are expected to bring several advantages for the crypto industry and its stakeholders: 1. Enhanced Security Stricter verification processes will help prevent fraud and unauthorized access. 2. Increased Trust Regulatory compliance can enhance consumer and investor confidence in the crypto sector. 3. Alignment with Global Norms By adhering to international standards, Australian crypto businesses can gain a competitive edge in the global market. 4. Better Consumer Protection Improved oversight ensures that users are safeguarded against scams and financial malpractice. Challenges Facing the Crypto Sector While the benefits are clear, implementing these regulations may pose challenges: 1. Higher Compliance Costs Crypto businesses, especially startups, may face financial strain in meeting stringent regulatory requirements. 2. Operational Complexity Enhanced reporting and verification measures could increase administrative burdens. 3. Privacy Concerns Critics argue that stricter regulations might compromise user anonymity, a core feature of cryptocurrencies. 4. Risk of Over-Regulation Overly rigid policies could stifle innovation and deter businesses from entering the market. Public Consultation: A Collaborative Approach AUSTRAC has invited feedback from industry stakeholders, ensuring that the final regulations are practical and balanced. Deadline : February 14, 2025 Key Participants : Crypto exchanges, blockchain startups, financial institutions, and consumer advocacy groups. This inclusive approach demonstrates AUSTRAC‚Äôs commitment to fostering a thriving yet secure cryptocurrency ecosystem. The Future of Cryptocurrency in Australia Australia‚Äôs proactive stance on crypto regulation could set a benchmark for other nations. By addressing financial crime risks while supporting innovation, the country can position itself as a global leader in the digital asset space. Opportunities for Growth Regulated Innovation : Clear rules encourage the development of innovative blockchain solutions. Attracting Global Talent : A secure and transparent crypto market could draw talent and investment from around the world. Conclusion Australia‚Äôs proposed regulations mark a significant step toward creating a secure and trustworthy cryptocurrency ecosystem. By targeting anti-money laundering and counter-terrorism financing, AUSTRAC aims to strike a balance between innovation and security. As the consultation period progresses, it will be crucial for industry stakeholders to collaborate and provide input, ensuring that the final regulations are both effective and equitable. With these measures, Australia is poised to become a leader in the global effort to integrate digital assets into the mainstream financial system responsibly. title: BlackRock‚Äôs Bitcoin ETF Surpasses Gold ETF in Assets Under Management
body: BlackRock‚Äôs Bitcoin ETF Surpasses Gold ETF in Assets Under Management CryptoQuant CEO Ki Young Ju has revealed that BlackRock‚Äôs spot Bitcoin ETF has overtaken its gold ETF in terms of assets under management (AUM) . This milestone signals a significant shift in investor sentiment, with digital assets like Bitcoin gaining momentum over traditional safe-haven assets such as gold. A Changing Landscape for Asset Allocation Ju shared the insights on X , highlighting the growing appeal of Bitcoin among savvy investors. Despite gold‚Äôs massive $17 trillion market capitalization compared to Bitcoin‚Äôs $2 trillion , the rising AUM for BlackRock‚Äôs Bitcoin ETF underscores a changing perspective on wealth preservation and growth. Bitcoin vs. Gold: A New Frontier Gold‚Äôs Legacy : Long considered a reliable store of value, gold has maintained its dominance for centuries. Bitcoin‚Äôs Appeal : As a digital alternative, Bitcoin offers decentralization, scarcity, and the potential for exponential returns. Ju emphasized that investing in Bitcoin over gold represents a forward-looking decision , aligning with technological advancements and evolving market dynamics. Key Factors Driving Bitcoin‚Äôs Momentum Several elements contribute to Bitcoin‚Äôs increasing popularity as an investment asset: 1. Institutional Adoption BlackRock‚Äôs Bitcoin ETF reflects growing acceptance of digital assets among institutional investors. A regulated ETF provides traditional investors with a secure and familiar way to gain Bitcoin exposure. 2. Superior Performance Bitcoin‚Äôs price performance has outpaced gold over the past decade, offering significantly higher returns. With Bitcoin‚Äôs limited supply and increasing demand, its long-term growth potential remains strong. 3. Digital Transformation The global shift toward digital finance has boosted Bitcoin‚Äôs relevance. Investors see Bitcoin as a hedge against inflation and currency devaluation in an increasingly digital economy. Implications of the Shift The overtaking of BlackRock‚Äôs gold ETF by its Bitcoin counterpart carries profound implications: 1. Investor Preferences The shift indicates a growing willingness among investors to diversify into digital assets. Bitcoin is increasingly seen as a complement, if not a replacement, for traditional safe-haven assets. 2. Competitive Market Dynamics Gold remains a significant asset, but Bitcoin‚Äôs rise introduces competition for capital allocation. The debate between gold and Bitcoin reflects broader shifts in market behavior and generational preferences. 3. Market Confidence in Bitcoin ETFs The success of Bitcoin ETFs like BlackRock‚Äôs could encourage further product innovation and adoption. It highlights the maturity of the cryptocurrency market as a viable investment space. Looking Ahead: The Case for Bitcoin Ju‚Äôs remarks underline the growing momentum behind Bitcoin and its potential to redefine traditional asset classes: Market Expansion : As institutional interest grows, Bitcoin‚Äôs market cap could narrow the gap with gold. Technological Relevance : Bitcoin‚Äôs role as the foundation of the digital asset ecosystem makes it uniquely positioned for future growth. Strategic Asset Allocation : For investors, incorporating Bitcoin represents a hedge against economic uncertainty and a bet on innovation. Conclusion The surpassing of BlackRock‚Äôs gold ETF by its Bitcoin ETF is a pivotal moment in the financial markets. It signifies not just Bitcoin‚Äôs rising prominence but also a broader shift in investor sentiment toward digital assets. As Bitcoin continues to gain traction, its potential to challenge traditional safe-haven assets like gold becomes increasingly evident. For forward-looking investors, Bitcoin offers a compelling case as the asset of the future. title: Australian Pension Giant AMP Invests $27 Million in Bitcoin
body: AMP, one of Australia‚Äôs largest superannuation funds, has taken a cautious step into the digital asset space with a $27 million Bitcoin investment, marking a first for the Australian pension industry. Meanwhile, in China, Alipay, the country‚Äôs leading payment platform, has drawn attention by featuring advertisements promoting Bitcoin ETFs, signaling a subtle yet intriguing shift in a market known for its strict anti-crypto stance. AMP‚Äôs $27 Million Bitcoin Investment Marks a Turning Point for Australian Superannuation Funds AMP, one of Australia's leading superannuation funds, has become the first major fund in the country to invest in Bitcoin (BTC). With a $27 million allocation to the digital asset in May 2024, AMP has joined the global trend of institutional investors exploring Bitcoin as a portfolio diversifier. The $27 million investment represents a modest 0.05% of AMP‚Äôs total $57 billion in assets under management (AUM). According to Financial Review , the fund acquired Bitcoin during its price range of $60,000 to $70,000, positioning itself to benefit from the cryptocurrency‚Äôs upward trajectory. AMP's move comes amid Bitcoin‚Äôs historic price rally, fueled by a surge in market sentiment following Donald Trump‚Äôs electoral victory in November 2024. Bitcoin recently breached the $100,000 milestone, signaling unprecedented confidence among market participants. Despite this bold move, other Australian superannuation funds remain hesitant to follow suit, citing the nascent asset class's volatility and regulatory uncertainty as primary concerns. AMP‚Äôs investment aligns with a broader global trend of pension funds integrating Bitcoin into their portfolios to capitalize on its growth potential and hedging properties. Institutional interest in Bitcoin has surged in recent years, with pension funds worldwide seeking to diversify holdings and enhance returns amid persistently low yields in traditional assets. In July 2024, Michigan‚Äôs state pension fund disclosed a $6.6-million exposure to Bitcoin through ARK 21Shares‚Äô Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF). This marked one of the first instances of a US state pension fund actively participating in the Bitcoin market. South Korea‚Äôs National Pension Service (NPS), the world‚Äôs third-largest public pension fund, followed in August with the acquisition of 24,500 MicroStrategy shares. Market participants view investments in MicroStrategy as a leveraged Bitcoin play due to the company‚Äôs significant Bitcoin holdings, financed through convertible notes and equity offerings. The trend has continued to gain momentum across regions. In October, Florida‚Äôs Chief Financial Officer, Jimmy Patronis, advocated for the state‚Äôs public pension funds to explore Bitcoin investments. More recently, United Kingdom-based pension manager Cartwright announced a 3% allocation to Bitcoin in November. Sam Roberts, Cartwright‚Äôs director of investment consulting, lauded Bitcoin‚Äôs ‚Äúunique asymmetric risk-return profile‚Äù as a compelling reason for the allocation. Roberts expressed optimism that the move would inspire other institutional investors in the UK to diversify into Bitcoin, setting a precedent for broader adoption. AMP‚Äôs decision to invest in Bitcoin suggests a willingness to embrace innovative asset classes while maintaining a conservative allocation. By integrating Bitcoin into its portfolio, the fund aims to benefit from the cryptocurrency's status as a hedge against inflation and its potential for outsized returns. The timing of the investment also demonstrates AMP‚Äôs strategic foresight. Bitcoin‚Äôs continued appreciation and the global recognition of its role in a diversified portfolio have positioned AMP as a trailblazer among Australian superannuation funds. Skepticism Persists in Australia Despite AMP‚Äôs bold move, the Australian superannuation industry remains largely cautious toward Bitcoin. Many funds view the asset as too volatile and speculative to fit within their long-term investment strategies. This skepticism is a stark contrast to the growing interest seen in regions like the United States, South Korea, and the United Kingdom, where pension funds are beginning to embrace Bitcoin as a legitimate investment option. AMP‚Äôs groundbreaking $27 million investment in Bitcoin marks a significant milestone for institutional adoption in Australia. While other superannuation funds may be hesitant to follow, AMP‚Äôs move could set the stage for a broader shift in the investment strategies of Australian pension funds. As Bitcoin continues to break records and solidify its role as a key asset in institutional portfolios, AMP‚Äôs foray into the cryptocurrency market could prove to be a transformative moment for the superannuation industry. Whether this sparks a trend among other funds remains to be seen, but the potential for Bitcoin to reshape institutional investing is undeniable. Alipay‚Äôs Bitcoin ETF Ads Stir Crypto Buzz in Mainland China Amid Strict Regulations Alipay, China‚Äôs largest payment platform with over 1 billion users, has caused a stir in the crypto community after reportedly featuring advertisements related to Bitcoin and cryptocurrency exchange-traded funds (ETFs) on its platform. According to reports from Sina Finance, mainland Chinese users recently saw promotional ads for spot Bitcoin ETFs on their Alipay homepages, marking a notable development in the country‚Äôs otherwise stringent approach to digital assets. The advertisements reportedly promoted cryptocurrency investments with messages such as: ‚ÄúGlobal investment, cryptocurrency soaring, 10 yuan minimum investment, get on board now.‚Äù The ads directed users to Huabao Overseas Technology C (QDII-FOF-LOF), a fund that reportedly offers indirect exposure to Coinbase stock and the ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF. While these ads signal an unexpected softening toward crypto-related services, they come with notable restrictions. Mainland China users are currently limited to purchasing a maximum of 1,000 Chinese yuan ($137) worth of the fund‚Äôs shares daily, with a minimum investment threshold of 10 yuan ($1.40). Prominent market observer Colin Wu noted on X that Huabao Technology and other similar funds advertising cryptocurrency are leveraging the Qualified Domestic Institutional Investor (QDII) structure. This regulatory framework allows Chinese investors to access overseas investments indirectly. Crypto Ads Raise Eyebrows The first reports of crypto-related ads on Alipay emerged on Dec. 11, sparking widespread discussion in the Chinese blockchain community. Some users speculated that this could be a precursor to enabling direct Bitcoin purchases through Alipay, a move that would represent a seismic shift in China‚Äôs crypto policy. However, the appearance of these ads may not signal an official endorsement from Alipay‚Äôs parent company, Ant Financial Services Group. Yifan He, CEO of Chinese blockchain firm Red Date Technology, suggested that the ads might have been published by third parties exploiting regulatory loopholes. ‚ÄúIt doesn‚Äôt mean anything. They will disappear soon,‚Äù He stated, downplaying the significance of the ads. China has long maintained a strict anti-crypto stance, with Alipay itself banning all Bitcoin-related transactions in 2019. This ban aligned with the Chinese government‚Äôs broader crackdown on cryptocurrencies, which began with the prohibition of crypto exchanges in 2017 and escalated with an interdepartmental clampdown in 2021. Despite these measures, Chinese authorities have repeatedly emphasized that crypto assets are considered legal property protected under law. The crypto ads on Alipay have reignited speculation about a potential policy shift in China. Earlier this year, Galaxy Digital CEO Mike Novogratz fueled rumors that China might lift its crypto ban amid the ongoing 2024 bull market. However, skepticism remains high, as the Chinese government has shown no official signs of reversing its restrictive crypto policies. Bloomberg analyst Jack Wang noted in April that Hong Kong‚Äôs crypto ETFs remain unavailable to mainland Chinese investors, reinforcing the divide between the two jurisdictions. Nevertheless, smaller developments, such as Nano Labs‚Äîa Hangzhou-based crypto mining-chip designer‚Äîaccepting Bitcoin as payment via Coinbase, suggest a nuanced shift in attitudes toward digital assets. The appearance of Bitcoin ETF ads on Alipay is a significant moment for the global crypto industry, highlighting both the growing demand for digital assets and the creative strategies used to navigate restrictive regulatory environments. While these ads may not reflect an official policy change, they demonstrate the potential for cryptocurrency-related services to gain traction in markets traditionally hostile to digital assets.

title: AI-Driven Cryptocurrencies Set for Explosive Growth, Says Syncracy Capital Co-Founder
body: AI-Driven Cryptocurrencies Set for Explosive Growth, Says Syncracy Capital Co-Founder Daniel Cheung , co-founder of cryptocurrency hedge fund Syncracy Capital , has forecasted a tenfold growth in AI-integrated cryptocurrencies, which currently account for only 1% of the total crypto market capitalization . Cheung‚Äôs statement, shared on X , highlights the transformative potential of AI advancements in shaping the future of the cryptocurrency market. AI and Cryptocurrencies: A Growing Intersection AI-driven cryptocurrencies integrate artificial intelligence technologies into blockchain ecosystems, offering innovative solutions and applications such as predictive analytics, automated decision-making, and enhanced security protocols. Despite their current niche status, Cheung believes the sector has untapped potential to outpace other segments in the market. Cheung‚Äôs Key Predictions Market Share Growth : AI-integrated cryptocurrencies could grow from 1% to 10% of the total market cap . Advancements Driving Growth : Improvements in AI infrastructure , agent platforms , and the rise of AI agents are expected to accelerate adoption and investment. What‚Äôs Driving AI-Integrated Crypto Growth? Several factors contribute to the promising outlook for AI-driven cryptocurrencies: 1. Rapid Advancements in AI Infrastructure The growing sophistication of AI systems, including machine learning models and neural networks, aligns seamlessly with blockchain‚Äôs decentralized architecture. 2. Emergence of AI Agents AI agents, capable of executing tasks autonomously, can revolutionize industries such as decentralized finance (DeFi), supply chain management, and customer service by leveraging smart contracts. 3. Rising Demand for Predictive Analytics AI-enhanced platforms provide unparalleled insights into market trends and asset performance, attracting institutional and retail investors seeking a competitive edge. 4. Integration with Blockchain Technology The secure and immutable nature of blockchain enhances the reliability of AI systems, creating a robust foundation for applications requiring trust and transparency. Challenges for AI-Driven Cryptocurrencies While the potential for growth is immense, the sector must address key challenges: Regulatory Uncertainty : Governments worldwide are still formulating policies for AI and cryptocurrency, which could impact adoption. Technological Barriers : The integration of AI with blockchain requires significant computational power and infrastructure investment. Market Education : Educating investors and stakeholders about the unique value propositions of AI-driven crypto remains essential. Top AI-Integrated Cryptocurrencies to Watch Several projects are leading the charge in the AI-crypto space, focusing on diverse applications: Fetch.ai (FET) : Specializes in autonomous economic agents. SingularityNET (AGIX) : A decentralized AI marketplace. Ocean Protocol (OCEAN) : Focuses on secure data sharing powered by AI. Conclusion As advancements in AI infrastructure and applications gain momentum, the intersection of artificial intelligence and blockchain technology is poised for exponential growth. Daniel Cheung‚Äôs prediction underscores the transformative potential of AI-driven cryptocurrencies to reshape the market landscape, offering investors new opportunities to capitalize on innovation. The sector‚Äôs success will depend on overcoming technological and regulatory challenges while educating the market on its immense possibilities. With a potential tenfold growth on the horizon, AI-driven cryptocurrencies are a space to watch closely in the coming years. To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on latest news, where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.

title: Alipay Denies Crypto Purchase Rumors, Labels Them ‚ÄúGroundless‚Äù
body: Alipay Denies Crypto Purchase Rumors, Labels Them ‚ÄúGroundless‚Äù Alipay , one of China‚Äôs leading payment platforms, has firmly denied rumors that it supports cryptocurrency purchases. In a statement shared on X (formerly Twitter), Alipay dismissed the claims as ‚Äúgroundless‚Äù and humorously referenced a viral banana ad featuring Tron founder Justin Sun , cautioning users against drawing unfounded conclusions. The Allegations and Alipay‚Äôs Response Rumors surfaced on social media suggesting that Alipay‚Äôs platform was being used for cryptocurrency transactions, fueling speculation about the company‚Äôs stance on digital assets. Alipay‚Äôs Official Statement Alipay labeled the rumors as ‚Äúfake news‚Äù and reiterated its adherence to existing regulations. The company clarified that its platform does not support cryptocurrency purchases, emphasizing its commitment to legal and compliant operations. In a lighthearted remark, Alipay stated: ‚ÄúJust because you saw a banana ad on X, it doesn‚Äôt mean you can buy bananas on X!‚Äù Alipay‚Äôs Stance on Cryptocurrencies Alipay has consistently maintained a cautious approach toward cryptocurrencies, in line with China‚Äôs stringent regulatory framework. Key Policies Prohibition on Crypto Transactions : Alipay prohibits the use of its platform for cryptocurrency-related activities, including trading and purchases. Regulatory Compliance : The payment giant operates under the oversight of the People‚Äôs Bank of China (PBOC) , which has banned cryptocurrency transactions to prevent financial risks. Anti-Fraud Measures : Alipay actively monitors and flags suspicious activities to ensure compliance with anti-money laundering (AML) and counter-terrorism financing (CTF) laws. The Role of Social Media in Spreading Rumors The rapid spread of false information highlights the challenges companies face in the digital age. Justin Sun‚Äôs Banana Ad The viral ad featuring Tron‚Äôs Justin Sun humorously eating a banana inadvertently fueled speculation. Social media users drew baseless connections between the ad and Alipay‚Äôs alleged involvement in cryptocurrency transactions. Alipay‚Äôs Proactive Response By swiftly addressing the rumors, Alipay reinforced its commitment to transparency and regulatory adherence while dispelling misinformation. Cryptocurrency Regulations in China Alipay‚Äôs strict stance reflects China‚Äôs broader regulatory environment, which has taken a hard line on cryptocurrency activities: 1. Ban on Crypto Trading and Mining The Chinese government has outlawed cryptocurrency trading and mining to prevent financial instability. 2. Promotion of the Digital Yuan China‚Äôs central bank digital currency (CBDC), the digital yuan , has been heavily promoted as an alternative to decentralized cryptocurrencies. 3. Impact on Businesses Companies operating in China must comply with these regulations, avoiding any association with banned crypto activities. Industry Reactions The denial by Alipay underscores a broader industry trend of navigating misinformation and aligning with regulations: Reaffirming Compliance : Companies like Alipay are doubling down on transparency to maintain user trust. Managing Perceptions : False rumors can impact brand reputation, prompting swift responses from businesses. Balancing Innovation and Compliance : Firms in fintech and payments are exploring blockchain technologies while staying within regulatory boundaries. Conclusion Alipay‚Äôs firm denial of cryptocurrency purchase rumors highlights its commitment to compliance and its proactive approach to managing misinformation. As the crypto landscape continues to evolve, companies like Alipay must balance innovation with strict adherence to regulatory frameworks. For users and businesses alike, the incident serves as a reminder to verify information and avoid drawing unwarranted conclusions from viral content. title: Prosper Acquires 7,000 ASIC Miners from BITMAIN and Secures Strategic Funding to Democratize Bitcoin Mining
body: Dubai, United Arab Emirates, December 13th, 2024, Chainwire Prosper , a decentralized protocol democratizing access to Bitcoin mining by tokenizing institutional-grade Bitcoin hashrate as omnichain real-world assets (RWA), today announced the acquisition of over 7,000 ASIC miners from BITMAIN along with the successful closing of its strategic funding round. Backed by Metalpha, Waterdrip Capital, BIT Mining, Animoca Brands, and more, Prosper has procured the new ASIC miners from BITMAIN to bring institutional-grade execution quality to its protocol Prosper aims to expand its underlying Bitcoin hashrate capacity to accelerate the flywheel of DAO-owned hashrate and Bitcoin treasury operations & democratise access to institutional-grade mining Following the announcement of Prosper‚Äôs long-term partnership and hosting service agreement with BITMAIN, the world‚Äôs leading manufacturer of digital currency mining servers, this landmark purchase marks an instrumental step in Prosper‚Äôs mission to provide institutional-grade reliability to its mining ecosystem. By leveraging BITMAIN‚Äôs cutting-edge products, Prosper enhances the value delivered to its $PROS token holders, further distinguishing itself as the premier Web3 Bitcoin mining protocol backed by leading industry players. ‚ÄúBitcoin brought about a fundamental shift in finance by democratizing an economic system in its entirety with blockchain technology. Prosper follows the footsteps of Bitcoin‚Äôs core ethos by democratizing access to Bitcoin hashrate, the underlying layer powering Bitcoin-through blockchain technology. This layer of community governance and ownership afforded by blockchain allows Prosper to scale its flywheel of both Bitcoin hashrate and treasury operations while simultaneously helping to ensure that Bitcoin mining layer is sufficiently decentralized to maintain Bitcoin‚Äôs status as the most recognized digital reserve currency. ‚Äù said Milton Lam, Prosper Advisory Council Member. Prosper‚Äôs Latest Development 1 EH/s of hashrate procured and ready to fully go live (with 250 PH/s live on Prosper‚Äôs dApp already) Access to pipeline capacity of 170MW with the mid-term goal of adding another 5 EH/s More than 2 BTC rewards given out to $PROS holders since November Access to more than 200 BTC to be delegated by launch partners to the DAO to unlock TVL opportunities for $PROS holders Strategic Round Closure: Strengthening the Bitcoin Ecosystem In addition to its BITMAIN partnership, Prosper announced the closure of its strategic funding round, which saw participation from prominent industry players and financial investors, including Metalpha, Waterdrip Capital, BIT Mining, and Satoshi Protocol. Earlier in October, Animoca Brands also disclosed its intention to purchase $PROS tokens from the open market. These investments demonstrate the strong confidence in Prosper‚Äôs vision of bridging institutional-grade Bitcoin mining power on-chain and its innovative approach to Bitcoin liquidity farming. The involvement of these strategic partners brings crucial industry expertise and networks to support Prosper‚Äôs operations as it scales. Positioning Prosper for Growth Prosper‚Äôs tokenomics adopts a unique design to ensure hashrate-per-token will only increase and be accretive to $PROS holders. Prosper‚Äôs DAO leverages a unique flywheel model with both hashrate and Bitcoin treasury operations - all governed by and for the benefits of $PROS holders. Institutional-grade hashrate generates Bitcoin on an ongoing basis, part of which is rewarded to holders for their active participation, and remaining goes to the DAO treasury. DAO‚Äôs treasury Bitcoin can be directed towards TVL opportunities with ecosystem partners such as Bitcoin L2 to generate benefits for $PROS holders and the DAO. Growth in DAO treasury value and $PROS adoption allows the protocol to further expand underlying hashrate and enhance protocol resilience. By combining institutional-grade Bitcoin mining hashrate, a decentralized protocol design backed by strong fundamentals, and an extensive network of strategic partners, Prosper is well-positioned to solidify its status as the flagship decentralized Bitcoin mining protocol. About Prosper Prosper is a decentralized protocol for a community that truly believes in Bitcoin, providing full exposure across Bitcoin hashrate and Bitcoin through tokenizing institutional-grade Bitcoin hashrate as omnichain RWA, and aims to fully unlock the potential of Bitcoin. For more information, users can visit prosper-fi.com or follow on X (formerly Twitter) . ContactProspercontact@prosper-fi.com Disclaimer: This is a sponsored press release and is for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.

title: Whale and Shark Activity Pushes Chainlink (LINK) Past $29 For the First Time in 37 Months
body: Chainlink (LINK) has recently surpassed the $29 mark for the first time in 37 months. Over the past week, the native token of the decentralized oracle network posted a 21% gain. As a result, LINK has emerged as one of the best-performing altcoins in recent weeks. Whale and Shark Gobble Up LINK The surge is largely fueled by a significant increase in whale and shark accumulation, according to the latest analysis by Santiment. Over the past two months, wallets holding 100K or more LINK have added 5.69 million tokens, while wallets with less than 100K LINK have reduced their positions by 5.67 million tokens. Historically, such patterns ‚Äì where large wallets accumulate coins from impatient or panicked retail traders ‚Äì often signal future growth. However, the success of Chainlink and other large-cap altcoins still hinges on Bitcoin‚Äôs ability to maintain its momentum, the on-chain crypto analytic platform said in its findings . If Bitcoin continues to hold steady, there are strong indications that patient holders of LINK will see long-term rewards. The recent surge in the price can also be attributed, in part, to World Liberty Financial‚Äôs $1 million purchase of LINK, increasing its holdings to $2 million. Backed by the Trump family, the platform also holds significant amounts of Aave‚Äôs AAVE , with LINK now being its fourth-largest holding after Ethereum (ETH), Bitcoin (BTC), and Tether (USDT). World Liberty Financial uses Chainlink‚Äôs services for essential pricing data and cross-chain interoperability. LINK Futures OI Reaches All-Time High This surge in value also coincided with a notable increase in Futures Open Interest (OI). According to Glassnode, this figure has hit an all-time high of $770.27 million, signaling a massive uptick in trading activity. There‚Äôs also been a significant profit-taking in the spot market, with $35.57 million in realized profits, making it the second-largest profit-taking event of the year, behind only February 11‚Äôs $40.39 million. This activity was predominantly driven by speculative market participants, with 15.3% of profits taken by ultra-short-term holders (1d-1w) and 22.5% by short-term holders (3-6m). Despite the profit-taking, LINK‚Äôs fundamentals are showing positive signs, with active addresses trending higher, signaling continued interest and potential for future growth, though still below the 2021 peak. The post Whale and Shark Activity Pushes Chainlink (LINK) Past $29 For the First Time in 37 Months appeared first on CryptoPotato .

Intel Markets utilizes the potential of the most effective AI algorithms to analyze live market data, predict the market, and perform trading operations. This advanced technology has a lot of advantages for the traders. First of all, it increases accuracy to the maximum level, which is crucial for the execution of correct trades. Secondly, it helps to minimize the trading process by automating the work, thus saving time for traders and excluding the possibility of making a mistake. Thirdly, advanced tools allow traders to make large profits using a 1000x leverage. In the meantime, Intel Markets is still in the presale stage and has raised over $4.1 million. The INTL coin is priced at $0.064091, an increase of 600% in the past few months. Those who missed out on this return still have a chance to join the presale and boom up to 15x profit before it ends. Cardano forecasted to reach $6 based on previous cycle Cantonese Cat predicts the value of the Cardano token could rise to $6-$8 in the next few weeks. The analyst believes the DeFi coin is following the same pattern from 2021. At the time, Cardano was trading around $0.4 before it rallied to the $3 region. Another analyst called Sssebi posted a similar prediction. According to him, there are some similarities between the Cardano price movement in 2021 and 2024. The analyst noted the bull season is on the way. At the moment, the altcoin is showing mixed sentiment on the price chart. CoinMarketCap data shows its value has dropped by 2.6% in the weekly timeframe. However, the Cardano crypto is bullish on the biweekly and monthly charts with price increases of 15.7% and 96.7%, respectively. Its 14-day RSI is above the midline, hinting at a potential rally. In Conclusion Investors who want big gains in the coming months should consider Dogecoin, Intel Markets, and Cardano. Analysts forecast their prices could skyrocket to new levels in the coming months. Intel Markets is already up 600%, outshining most altcoins in the market. title: Lithium Registers as an Official Company in California and Offers a Pre-Sale Price of $0.2 with a Launch Price of $1.5.
body: Lithium Ecosystem (LTM) has successfully raised $1.1 million in its pre-sale phase, marking a significant milestone in its mission to revolutionize blockchain technology and cryptocurrency trading. Led by a team of veteran developers drawing inspiration from industry leaders like Ethereum, Solana, and Render, Lithium Ecosystem is developing an innovative blockchain-based exchange network that uniquely combines renewable energy, Bitcoin mining, and P2P trading capabilities. Key Highlights: $1.1 Million Raised: Strong investor confidence demonstrated through successful pre-sale funding Limited Supply: Only 20 million tokens will be created, with 30% scheduled for burning post-listing Price Pre-sale: $0.2 Price Listing: $1.5 Final Supply: After the planned burn, only 14 million tokens will remain in circulation Market Strategy: Positioned as one of the scarcest cryptocurrencies in the market Innovative Integration: Combines renewable energy, Bitcoin mining, and P2P trading in one ecosystem HardCap of 2M, will be launched 24 hours after completing this goal. It will be an efficient launch without much lag ‚ÄúOur vision is to create a more sustainable and efficient blockchain ecosystem that addresses the growing demands of the cryptocurrency market,‚Äù said Sofia Anther, co-founder at Lithium Ecosystem. ‚ÄúThe successful raise of $1.1 million in our pre-sale phase validates the market‚Äôs confidence in our approach.‚Äù The project‚Äôs tokenomics are strategically designed to maintain scarcity, with its limited supply positioning LTM alongside other successful cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (21 million coins) and Ethereum (approximately 120 million tokens). For more information about Lithium Ecosystem and its innovative solutions, visit www.lithiumecosystem.com or join the community discussion on Telegram at t.me/lithiumecosystem . Whitepaper: https://lithiums-organization.gitbook.io/lithium-ecosystem-whitepaper About Lithium Ecosystem: Lithium Ecosystem is a next-generation blockchain platform combining renewable energy, Bitcoin mining, and P2P trading capabilities. The project aims to create a more sustainable and efficient cryptocurrency ecosystem while maintaining token scarcity through its limited supply structure.

title: Memecoins Impact on Crypto Adoption in 2024: The Role of Market Makers Like CLS Global
body: Since the advent of Dogecoin in 2014, Memecoin has become a significant force in the crypto space. Initially dismissed as speculative and frivolous, these playful digital assets, often inspired by internet memes, have proven their ability to drive significant market activity and attract a new wave of participants to the crypto ecosystem. According to CoinGecko data , the memecoin market capitalization currently sits at $140 billion, up from its $17-21 billion range in 2023. As these coins gain traction, they serve as a gateway for newcomers to explore the broader cryptocurrency landscape, bridging the gap between casual interest and deeper engagement. This phenomenon raises a critical question: how are market makers, the backbone of liquidity and price stability in crypto markets, influencing the adoption and sustainability of memecoins? Understanding the dynamics between memecoins and market makers like CLS Global offers valuable insights into how this unconventional segment could drive mainstream crypto adoption. This article explores the impact of memecoins on the cryptocurrency ecosystem and the strategic role market makers play in this evolving narrative. Memecoin Impact on Crypto Adoption Memecoins primarily drive crypto adoption through their accessibility and cultural appeal. Unlike Bitcoin or Ethereum, which can seem intimidating due to their technical complexity and high prices, memecoins are often cheap and easy to understand. This low barrier to entry encourages first-time investors to dip their toes into the crypto market. Moreover, the viral nature of memecoins has expanded cryptocurrency‚Äôs reach beyond traditional financial circles. Social media platforms, particularly TikTok, Twitter, and Reddit, play a significant role in spreading awareness and creating buzz around memecoins. These platforms amplify community engagement, making cryptocurrency discussions more mainstream and inviting new demographics into the fold. However, the volatile and speculative nature of memecoins can deter institutional investors and long-term adoption. This is where market makers like CLS Global come into play, mitigating risks and ensuring smoother market operations. The Role of Market Makers Like CSL Global Market makers are essential for maintaining liquidity in financial markets, and their importance is magnified in the volatile world of memecoins. CLS Global , a leading player in the market-making space, has been instrumental in stabilizing trading environments for memecoins and the general crypto market. By providing liquidity, they reduce price slippage and create more efficient markets, making it easier for both retail and institutional investors to participate. In the case of memecoins, market makers like CLS Global offer several key benefits: ‚Ä¢ Liquidity Provision Many memecoins suffer from thin order books, which can lead to significant price fluctuations. Market makers step in to ensure consistent trading activity, reducing volatility and improving the user experience. ‚Ä¢ Increased Credibility Memecoin projects can demonstrate their commitment to creating sustainable ecosystems by partnering with market makers. This, in turn, attracts more serious investors and helps these tokens gain legitimacy. ‚Ä¢ Accessibility and Onboarding CLS Global and leading market makers often work with exchanges to optimize trading conditions. This collaboration makes it easier for new investors to buy and sell memecoins without excessive fees or delays. ‚Ä¢ Support for Innovation Beyond liquidity, market makers contribute to the growth of memecoins by supporting tokenomics design, advising on market strategies, and ensuring regulatory compliance. These services are critical for turning a viral sensation into a long-term success story. Overview of CLS Global CLS Global is a leading crypto market-maker, especially on centralized exchanges (CEXs). In today‚Äôs crypto world, projects need more than just a market marker that provides trading liquidity. These projects need industry-oriented partners who clearly understand traditional finance and the unique crypto dynamics. CLS Global has positioned itself to serve as both a liquidity provider and a support system for various crypto and blockchain projects at different stages of development. CLS Global services include but are not limited to market making, helping projects navigate the complexities of exchange listing, and comprehensive liquidity strategies to ensure token visibility and reduce slippage for clients. Aside from the market-making services, CLS Global also offers consulting services ranging from financial modeling to marketing strategies, connecting projects with potential investors. Some of CLS Global‚Äôs growth initiatives include: ‚Ä¢ Building relationships with over 60 VC funds/advisors‚Ä¢ Developing comprehensive technical and business roadmaps‚Ä¢ Building stronger connections with top exchanges like Binance, MEXC, Kucoin, and Huobi.‚Ä¢ Enhancing marketing capabilities and partnerships Since its inception in 2017, CLS Global has integrated over 80 centralized exchanges, currently services more than 500 clients, and has attracted over 1 million holders. Conclusion The initial exposure to memecoins often leads investors to explore more established cryptocurrencies and blockchain-based applications, contributing to overall market growth. Market makers like CLS Global play a pivotal role in bridging the gap between speculative hype and sustainable adoption. By providing the infrastructure needed for stable and efficient trading, they help transform memecoins from fleeting trends into enduring assets within the crypto economy. The interplay between memecoins, market makers, and the broader blockchain ecosystem will likely shape the next wave of cryptocurrency adoption. With the right balance of innovation, community engagement, and institutional support, memecoins could continue to drive interest in crypto, proving that even the most unusual aspects of the blockchain world can profoundly impact its future. title: Arkansas GOP Rep and Crypto Ally French Hill Secures House Financial Services Committee Chairmanship
body: Rep. French Hill, a staunch supporter of the crypto sector, secured the House Financial Services Committee chairmanship on Thursday. Hill (R-Arkansas) will take the reins from fellow GOP lawmaker Patrick McHenry (R-North Carolina), who didn‚Äôt seek reelection this year. McHenry is also a vocal digital asset advocate . Hill has an ‚ÄúA‚Äù rating from Stand With Crypto, a digital asset advocacy group backed by top US crypto exchange Coinbase. He¬†co-sponsored the pro-crypto House Resolution 109 , which would have reversed the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission‚Äôs (SEC) Staff Accounting Bulletin (SAB) 121. SAB 121 is a guidance bulletin that states certain companies should label digital assets as liabilities on their balance sheets, even if they are simply holding them for customers. The House Resolution passed the House and Senate earlier this year but was vetoed by President Joe Biden in May. A House effort to overturn the veto failed to secure the necessary two-thirds majority in July. The Arkansas lawmaker has also blasted the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) for allegedly having ‚Äúpressured banks to sever ties with entire industries like crypto.‚Äù Hill promised in November that the House Financial Services Committee would work with President-elect Donald Trump to halt that pressure and conduct an investigation. Dogecoin continues to attract mainstream attention, Pepe Coin rides the wave of meme coin popularity, and Yeti Ouro carves a unique niche in gaming and utility. Let‚Äôs explore what sets these altcoins apart and why they‚Äôre expected to dominate in 2025. Dogecoin News: The Original Meme Coin Still Reigns Dogecoin remains a favorite among crypto enthusiasts. Despite being created as a joke, it has proven its staying power. Yeti Ouro: The Rising Star Of The P2E Market While DOGE focuses on payments and community, Yeti Ouro has carved a niche in the P2E gaming ecosystem.
